newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary forint ends firmer vs dlr.
newsitem.headline: Hungary forint ends firmer vs dlr.

text.p: The Hungarian forint closed sharply firmer against the dollar on Thursday as the U.S. currency slid against the German mark, dealers said.
They added the forint remained unchanged against the currency basket as it was stuck at the central bank's resistance level.
The forint finished at 188.47/52 to the dollar, compared to 189.58/63 at opening.
(The NBH's floating intervention band is 4.5 percent wide. The forint floats against a currency basket made up 30 percent of the dollar and 70 percent of the mark.)
